channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Directory Integrator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Directory Integrator

item.title: CVE-2022-32759|2024-07-26T14:52:31.126Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20integrator
item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 uses insufficient session expiration which could allow an unauthorized user to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 228565.

item.title: CVE-2024-28772|2024-07-26T14:01:17.662Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20integrator
item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285645.

item.title: CVE-2024-28772|2024-07-25T17:18:40.388Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20integrator
item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285645.
